content: the last 3 stitches single_crochet forward until you get the best and continue with pink placement 34-35 single_crochet x 27 27 36 single_crochet x 7 decrease x 3 24 stuff and continue stuffing until fastening off 37-39 single_crochet x 24 24 change to coral 4 | p age © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2020 40 single_crochet x 24 24 change to mint 41 in blo single_crochet x 2 decrease x 6 18 42 single_crochet x 18 18 43 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing antennae pink make 2 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 increase x 6 12 3-4 single_crochet x 12 12 5 decrease x 6 6 change to coral 6-9 single_crochet x 6 6 fasten_off and leave a tail for sewing keep unstuffed headband coral leave a long initial chain 1 ch16 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet x 14 15 fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing assembly you may sew in any order of preference this is what i do 1 head sew to body go around twice to make secure 2 arms sew to the sides of the body between rounds 37-39 3 hair sew after 4th round to the top of the head so that the fringe will sit at the front pin down the fringe and long hair strands spread evenly around the head sew each in place leaving the last 1-2 stitches of each strand unsewn 4 headband sew across the top of the head centred 5 antennae sew to either end of the headband and bend slightly 6 skirt see below skirt pink work into the front loops left unworked for the body round 32 staring the back slip_stitch and chain 1 at the end of each round to join 5 | p age © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2020 1 single_crochet x 30 30 2 single_crochet increase x 15 45 3 single_crochet x 45 45 4 single_crochet x 2 increase x 15 60 5 single_crochet x 60 60 change to coral 6 single_crochet x 3 increase x 15 75 7 single_crochet x 75 75 fasten_off and weave ends that s it enjoy your rosie 6 | p age © cara engwerda trading as cara s creations 2020
